title: Deep clean all rooms
description: Thoroughly clean all rooms including baseboards, windows, and hard-to-reach areas

title: Clean carpets and rugs
description: Professional carpet cleaning or rent a carpet cleaner

title: Wash windows inside and out
description: Clean all windows to maximize natural light

title: Fix leaky faucets
description: Repair or replace any dripping faucets

title: Patch nail holes and touch up paint
description: Fill holes from wall hangings and repaint affected areas

title: Fix broken tiles or grout
description: Replace cracked tiles and repair grout in bathrooms and kitchen

title: Replace burned-out light bulbs
description: Ensure all light fixtures have working bulbs

title: Declutter and organize closets
description: Remove personal items and organize remaining items neatly

title: Remove personal photos and items
description: Pack away family photos and personal mementos

title: Stage living areas
description: Arrange furniture to maximize space and appeal

title: Neutralize decor
description: Replace bold colors and patterns with neutral tones

title: Gather repair receipts
description: Collect receipts for all repairs and improvements made

title: Prepare disclosure documents
description: Organize all required seller disclosure forms

title: Schedule professional photos
description: Book professional photographer for listing photos

title: Take before photos
description: Document current condition before starting prep work

title: Clean and stage outdoor areas
description: Tidy yard, deck, and patio areas for curb appeal

title: Fix loose handles and knobs
description: Tighten or replace cabinet handles and door knobs
